description.value:
A Helmet that draws breathable oxygen from water, allowing a wearer to stay underwater indefinitely, As long as its flesh-components are kept wet. It has a functional life of a decade before needing replacement. Offers no Protection against harmful air-born toxins, only designed to work underwater.

Effect: Rare

Notes: 250 T
